thread.title: The most beautiful places in Ireland
thread.title_full: The most beautiful places in Ireland

title: The most beautiful places in Ireland
text:
Previous slide Next slide 1 of 17 View All Skip Ad 
Hollywood actor Matt Damon, who recently spent time in China for the filming of The Great Wall , revealed his love for another part of the world this week: the West Coast of Ireland , where he dreams of owning a lighthouse along the Wild Atlantic Way (pictured). 
“How awesome would that be? Watching the Atlantic crashing over the Irish cliffs, the rain coming down, the grey skies," he told The Irish Sun . “That whole geographical area, from Cork to Kerry, Galway, that environment is like nowhere, it’s good for the health. 
“I just have this image, this dream of sitting atop of the lighthouse, looking out to sea, and how beautiful and peaceful that must be." Alamy
